summary: This document contains due diligence research results conducted by Deutsche Bank on Southern Trust Company, Inc. It includes various search results related to the company, including negative and non-negative media findings, and public records. The document emphasizes the importance of compliance and the need for escalation in case of significant findings.

persons.name: Deepak Khandelwal
persons.context: Deepak Khandelwal is identified as the research analyst who prepared the due diligence report on Southern Trust Company, Inc.

persons.name: Robert E. Mannion
persons.context: Robert E. Mannion is mentioned as the attorney who requested information regarding the Board's Order related to bank holding companies.

persons.name: William W. Wiles
persons.context: William W. Wiles is referenced as the Secretary of the Board who provided an opinion regarding the application of Avantor Financial Corporation.

keyFacts: The document is a due diligence report on Southern Trust Company, Inc. conducted by Deutsche Bank.
No significant negative media results were found for Southern Trust Company, Inc.
The document includes a request for compliance review and escalation procedures for any alerts.
Robert E. Mannion is mentioned in relation to a legal inquiry about bank holding company regulations.
William W. Wiles provided an opinion on a bank holding company application related to Citizens and Southern Corporation.
